name: The Final Funktier
description:
Description

The Final Funktier is a rhythm space shooter that uses an alternative controller. The evil Ampire has stolen the galaxy's music, and it's your job to get it back. Maneuver your ship and dodge obstacles. Shoot at enemy ships on the beat. Inspired by Cowboy Bebop and Star Wars, the game features a pumping neo-funk soundtrack and a future-junk aesthetic in rich, saturated colors.

Controls

Move ship: spin mouse wheel

Shoot: left click, s, d, f, or g
